        Parameters:
        context - the Application Context.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the context is null and the persistence has not already been initialized

      • setLoggedUserTag

      • removeLoggedUserTag

        public static void removeLoggedUserTag()

      • addPersistentTag

        public java.lang.String addPersistentTag(java.lang.String key,
                                         java.lang.String value)
        Used for adding a global persistent tag which will stick to all log messages on all threads. This will look something like "[KEY VALUE]" in the log messages and will appear before the Scope Tags NOTE: this will apply to the ScopedLoggers already instantiated as well
        Parameters:
        key - The string param which will represent the KEY in the tag. There is NO REQUIREMENT for it to be unique.
        value - The string param which will represent the VALUE in the tag.
        Returns:
        a String unique identifier which can be used to remove the newly added tag

      • removePersistentTagsFromKey

        public int removePersistentTagsFromKey(java.lang.String key)
        Used for removing all the persistent tags having a particular String as the key
        Parameters:
        key - the (case-sensitive) key we are looking for in order to remove the tags
        Returns:
        the number of tags that were removed based on the given key

      • removePersistentTag

        public int removePersistentTag(java.lang.String uniqueTagIdentifier)
        Used for removing a particular persistent tag
        Parameters:
        uniqueTagIdentifier - the String unique identifier for the tag to be remove
        Returns:
        10 if the String identifier is not known; 11 if for any reason the operation could not be performed; 12 if the tag was successfully removed

      • clearPersistentTags

        public int clearPersistentTags()
        Used for removing all the persistent tags
        Returns:
        the number of tags removed
